name: MouseGuests
0:
”Alexa, ask Mouse Guests what is the wait time for Pirates of the Caribbean?”
”Alexa, ask Mouse Guests what time does Disneyland open tomorrow?”
”Alexa, ask Mouse Guests what time is World of Color?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mouse guests
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A visit to Disneyland or Walt Disney World can be a magical experience. Mouse Guests helps you make the most of your visit by providing park hours for all six of Disney's U.S. theme parks as well as real-time attraction wait times that you can use while planning to set expectations and while in the park using a mobile Alexa device such as Echo Frames, Echo Loop, TalkSocket, or the Alexa companion application on your mobile phone. 

You can also tell Mouse Guests when your next trip will be and then, as you dream about your upcoming visit, ask Mouse Guests how many days until you enter the magic!
